select substr(use_date, 1, 10) as use_date, to_char(((pen_cnt * 0.1) * 100), '99,999,999,990') as profit, to_char((pen_cnt * 100),'99,999,999,990') as exchange_amount from pen_management where use_type = '3' order by use_date desc

select substr(use_date,1, 7) as use_date, ((pen_cnt * 0.1) * 100) as profit, (pen_cnt * 100) as exchange_amount from pen_management where use_type = '3' and use_date like #use_date# || '%' order by use_date desc

select * from (select sum((pen_cnt * 0.1) * 100) as profit, substr(use_date, 1, 10) as profit_date from pen_management where use_type = '3' group by substr(use_date, 1, 10) order by profit_date desc) where rownum <= 7 order by profit_date asc
